game.name: Not Only Nine
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A cat soul journeys through The Afterlife to save their human. An ancient being (helps?) defeat the Reapers in this narrative RPG adventure.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cat soul journeys through The Afterlife to save their human. An ancient being (helps?) defeat the Reapers in this narrative RPG adventure.
